events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue is identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Support agent Jane Smith has been assigned to handle this refund inquiry.
Hello! Iâ€™m Jane from customer support, here to help you with your refund request for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund?
My order number is 458723 and I have attached photos showing the wrong product that was delivered to my address.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your account and arrange a free return pickup for the incorrect item.
That sounds good, thank you for handling it quickly. I appreciate the free return pickup option as well.
Your refund request has been processed successfully, and the return label will be emailed shortly for your convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and the return process went smoothly.
Since everything is resolved and you're satisfied, we are closing this support case now.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
